p: Regional and national interviewees stressed the need to increase local research capabilities, in part by strengthening collaboration with universities ( Fig 2). Interviewees from the Barbados NMHS indicated that they had limited experience with climate research, and that this was an area that they were interested in expanding. National health sector interviewees displayed a high level of field experience and local knowledge but indicated that they had little knowledge of local empirical studies that could inform their decision-making and planning processes.
